import React from 'react' const Coin = ({rank, image, name, symbol, price, change, volume, mcap}) => { return (

{rank}.

{name}{symbol}

${price.toFixed(2).toLocaleString()}

{change.toFixed(2)}%

{volume.toLocaleString()}

${mcap.toLocaleString()}

) } export default Coin
